SubModule_Description: To use the Light Matrix module add the following import statement to your project:

Function.Function_Signature: set_pixel(x: int, y: int, intensity: int) -> None
Function.Function_Description: Sets the brightness of one pixel (one of the 25 LEDs) on the Light Matrix.

Parameters.Argument_Description: How bright to light up the pixel

Python_Code.Python_Code:
from hub import light_matrix
# Turn on the pixel in the center of the hub 
light_matrix.set_pixel(2, 2, 100)
Python_Code.Python_Description: Sets the brightness of one pixel (one of the 25 LEDs) on the Light Matrix.
